messages.messageBody:
>Hey Summer!!
>
>It's great to meet you!!! Matter of fact I would like to talk to you and
>Eryn about creating some teen space on the unschooling.com site!

Hey, that would be cool. I'd love to help with that if you decide that's
what you'd like on unschooling.com. Unfortuntaly, I cannot write more
because I have a million emails to answer, but if you want to talk to me
privately my email is OmegaMolecule@... Anyway, gotta go. :) ~Eryn
